name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Field Engineer with a strong foundation in problem-solving and customer service, I bring 8 years of experience in the field, specializing in delivering high-quality solutions for complex electrical and mechanical systems. My expertise includes hands-on field service operations, effectively implementing safety protocols, and training teams to adhere to best practices in PPE usage. I possess a keen ability to troubleshoot and resolve issues in real-time, ensuring optimal system performance and customer satisfaction.
In my previous roles, I have utilized **Salesforce** for managing client relationships and streamlining communication, enhancing service delivery and organizational efficiency. My background includes a focus on compliance and operational excellence, ensuring that all tasks meet strict industry standards and regulatory requirements.
